name: Jetpack Jaunt
description:
WHAT’S NEW

MORE PRETTY COLOURS! Game Background is now affected by your suit!

Indie Game.

Collect coins. Avoid missiles. Don't fall out the sky. Don't go too high. Simple.

Please use the 'Restore' features located in the app settings to restore suit progress and purchases if you have reinstalled the app or cleaned app data.

This game was made using the Corona 2D Game Engine : https://coronalabs.com/
